fields.name: table_name
fields.doc: Table on which the operation was performed.

fields.name: value
fields.doc: The value of the modification that was performed.

fields.name: type_id
fields.doc: return the type_id (when changing a table, a new type may be created)

fields.name: type_definition
fields.doc: return the type_definition  (when changing a table, a new type may be created)

fields.name: properties
fields.doc: return the type properties  (when changing a table, a new type may be created)

fields.name: label
fields.doc: return the type label  (when changing a table, a new type may be created)
